metadata.description: Cross-specification confusion tests: A789 (Tubing) vs A790 (Pipe)

critical_differences.A789: Seamless and Welded Ferritic/Austenitic Stainless Steel TUBING for General Service
critical_differences.A790: Seamless and Welded Ferritic/Austenitic Stainless Steel PIPE
critical_differences.supplementary: A789 has S1 only (Pneumatic Test), A790 has S1-S4

testCases.query: What is the yield strength of S32205 duplex tubing per ASTM A789?
testCases.notes: A789 yield is 70 ksi - NOT 65 ksi like A790. Most critical confusion test.
testCases.trap: System must not return A790 value (65 ksi) when asked about A789

testCases.query: What is the yield strength of S32205 duplex pipe per ASTM A790?
testCases.notes: A790 yield is 65 ksi - NOT 70 ksi like A789. Inverse of CONF-001.
testCases.trap: System must not return A789 value (70 ksi) when asked about A790

testCases.query: Compare the yield strength of S32205 in A789 tubing vs A790 pipe specifications
testCases.notes: Must correctly identify BOTH values with correct spec attribution
testCases.trap: Must cite both specs with correct values - not mix them up

testCases.query: What supplementary requirements are available in A789?
testCases.notes: A789 only has S1 (Pneumatic Test) - NOT S1-S4 like A790
testCases.trap: Must not list S2, S3, S4 which are only in A790

testCases.query: Does ASTM A789 include repair welding procedures?
testCases.notes: A789 has NO Section 15 - A790 does. Should refuse or clarify absence.
testCases.trap: Must not cite A790's Section 15 welding info for A789 question

testCases.query: What product form does A789 cover?
testCases.notes: A789 covers TUBING, A790 covers PIPE - fundamental distinction
testCases.trap: Must not say 'pipe' for A789 scope

testCases.query: What ASTM standards are referenced by A789?
testCases.notes: A789 references A480, A1016, E527 - NOT A370, A923, A999 (those are A790)
testCases.trap: Must not confuse referenced standards between A789 and A790

testCases.query: What is the tensile strength of S32003 per A789?
testCases.notes: A789 S32003 tensile = 100 ksi [690 MPa], A790 S32003 tensile = 95 ksi [655 MPa]
testCases.trap: Another grade with different values between A789 and A790

testCases.query: What dimensional tolerances apply to A789 tubing?
testCases.notes: A789 uses OD/wall thickness tolerances for tubing, NOT NPS/schedules
testCases.trap: Must not mention pipe schedules (NPS) which are A790 terminology

testCases.query: What is the yield strength of S32304 lean duplex per A789 for OD less than or equal to 1 inch?
testCases.notes: A789 has SIZE-DEPENDENT yield for S32304: <=1" OD = 65 ksi, >1" OD = 58 ksi
testCases.trap: A790 only has 58 ksi for S32304 - no size dependency
